name: A UI's UX: Demo
description:
A UI's UX: Demo

Upon entering the game, you are greeted to a main menu, where you just broke the Start button… In this game, you go into the backend of the game to traverse around looking to find a replacement Start button. Solve puzzles using elements of the game’s UI to progress through the backend. This is a demo, and was made for GDD 4900.
